archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: (excel) LÃ©o Tool
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
This tool is an obsolescence dashboard It was developed by a young guy in procurement and accesses to many internal databases It enables to retrieve many data: -photos -part info -stock, average consumption -obsolescence information -decisions per program -list of ongoing ECP
The tool calculates an obsolescence KPI with the seriousness of the impact in y while the programs are in x (sorted by EIS)
